name: Cake Mania 2: Jill's Next Adventure!
synopsis: After spending most of 2006 working to re-open the Evans Bakery, sending her grandparents on an exotic Hawaiian cruise, and taking a much-needed break herself, Jill is taking her long-awaited, triumphant return to Nintendo DS in Cake Mania 2, an all-new, out-of-this-world adventure!
